Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 86th overall pick, by Los Angeles (N) in 2012...
Had first career hit on 6/16/2015, off Vinnie Pestano (COL)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/4/2015, off Mat Latos (WSH)...
Injured on 6/21/2016 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/19/2018 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/10/2019, hitting .600 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 2019...
Traded from Los Angeles (N) to New York (A) on 3/2/2020 (Going to NYA: P K. Zimmer, SS F. Galvis. Going to LAN: SS C. Gehringer Jr., 3B K. Lobdell, P C. Coplin)...
Injured on 8/7/2021 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Chicago (A) on 5/25/2022...
